page.title: 18Darrell, Thornton celebrity
page.content: Mr Darrell, a local postman,has become famous as a champion{sheepdog handler, and has been training them for about 30 years. It takes about 18 months to train one. His first trial was in 1956 at Bolton Abbey.After winning at national and international trials he was invited to take part in the popular television programme,"One Man and His Dog ".He came second in the contest.The achievement he most treasures is winning the Brace International Championship in 1981 with his two dogs Pat and Cap. He is often invited to give demonstrations to the public, usually at galas and shows. Mr Darrell prefers trials to demonstrations because he enjoys the competition that these involve.
